name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms　VI with Power Up Kit / 三國志VI with パワーアップキット
description: "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅵ with Power Up Kit" is an expanded version of "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅵ," which was released in 1998 as the 6th game in the series. "Time of the Heavens" is depicted in dramatic historical events that enliven the world of the Three Kingdoms.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7(*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7(*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
